judges: Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.

opinions.text:
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below is affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Gordon.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Edwin S. Ward, with him O. Charles Brodersen, Assistant City Solicitors, and Frank F. Truscott, City Solicitor, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Gottlieb Appeal. Philadelphia Drainage Case.
Argued November 11, 1948.
Before Maxey, C. J., Drew, Linn, Stern, Patterson, Stearne and Jones, JJ.
Sidney B. Gottlieb, for appellant.
Edwin S. Ward, with him O. Charles Brodersen, Assistant City Solicitors, and Frank F. Truscott, City Solicitor, for appellee.
January 3, 1949:
